column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////The short rib chilaquiles was mediocre
column2: the smokehouse Benedict was actually tasty
column3: and the fruity people French toast will give anyone a sugar rush). If you are looking for a "wow" meal and great service
column4: you may want to continue your search. We did not order anything from the bar although most tables did have multiple drinks on them. So
column5: that might be the secret to why it has so many stars from other yelpers.
